## Welcome to Dracula UI

A dark-first collection of UI patterns and components.

entities.name: Principles
entities.description:
## 1. Dark Mode First

Most templates are built using light colors and later on adapted to dark colors.

The process of building a dark theme shouldn't be an afterthought - it should be a priority.

Dracula UI was created to be a dark-first template, taking in consideration all the complexities and UX challenges that dark mode brings.

## 2. Minimal Context Switch

We truly believe in the cost of context switching.

Your productivity is affected when you need to switch back and forth between a task. That's why our goal is to reduce that time as much as possible.

Developers usually have a hard time to utilize Design Systems and bring them to life, because they need to access different systems and tools.

By making Dracula UI accessible inside your code editor and by providing code autocompletion, you can be much more productive.

## 3. Modularity, Simplicty, and Portability

Our mission is to unleash the creative potential in every developer. We do that by providing modular components that can be reused and composed to generate patterns.

We live in a portable world, so why user interfaces should be any different? We are starting small, but we believe that Dracula UI should be available everywhere.

It is all about simplicity.
